name: Binnall Of America T-Shirt
description:
For fans of the Binnall Of America podcast, we have this wonderfully soft and comfy t-shirt. It features the BoA logo and website. 50% polyester, 38% cotton and 12% Rayon. 

SIZE CHART - Chest Size:

XXS 28-30
XS 30-32
S 34-36
M 38-40
L 42-44
XL 46-48
2X 48-50


The graphic, designed by me, is printed by a local, independent screenprinter.

A tremendous amount of care goes into each shirt manufactured by Alternative Apparel which produces unique stitching details and a perfect "no shrinkage" fit. This high quality shirt is garment washed, yielding an extremely soft fabric with a vintage feel. 

Before selling this shirt, I put one aside for myself to wash, wear, and test to make sure it was of the utmost quality. I am confident you will love wearing this shirt as much as I do.




SHIPPING

All shirts are mailed to you via USPS. They are neatly folded, wrapped in tissue paper secured with a sticker and ribbon and are placed inside a water resistant poly mailer.

************

Your happiness with our products is very important to us. If you have any problems please let us know as soon as possible and we will do our best to fix the situation.

name: Boobs T-Shirt (Grey)
description:
This incredibly soft T-Shirt is loosely knitted for excellent stretch and recovery by Alternative Apparel. The lightweight, fine gauge material is combined with a modern, body-conscious silhouette. This shirt is so comfortable it feels like you are wearing nothing at all!

The graphic, designed by me, is printed by a local, independent screenprinter.

A tremendous amount of care goes into each shirt manufactured by Alternative Apparel which produces unique stitching details and a perfect "no shrinkage" fit. name: Ladie's Cap Sleeve - Boobs T-Shirt (White)
description:
This shirt is a cap sleeve for the ladies. A cap sleeve is a very short sleeve (as on a dress) that hangs over the edge of the shoulder without extending along the underside of the arm. 

This incredibly soft T-Shirt is loosely knitted for excellent stretch and recovery by Alternative Apparel. The lightweight, fine gauge material is combined with a modern, body-conscious silhouette. This shirt is so comfortable it feels like you are wearing nothing at all!
